titleStmt.title: Anthony Paint[er] the blaspheming caryar Who sunke into the ground vp to the neck, and there stood two day[s and] two nights, and not to bee drawne out by the strength of hor[ses] or digged out by the help of man: and there dyed the 3. of Nouember. 1613. Also the punishment of Nicholas Mesle a most wicked blasphemer. Reade and tremble. Published by authoritie.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by G. Eld] for Iohn Trundle: and are to be sold at Christ Church Gate,

notesStmt.note: Bracketed parts of title from STC; printer's name from STC.
Includes: Briefes drawne out of the registers of the Court of Parliament.
Imperfect; title page cropped, affecting text.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
